description: Daraz is Bangladesh's largest online shopping marketplace, offering a wide range of products from fashion, electronics, home appliances, beauty products, and more.

coupons.description: Get 50% off on your first purchase.
Free shipping on all orders above BDT 500.
Buy 1 get 1 free on selected fashion items.

coupons.description: Get BDT 100 off on orders above BDT 1500.
coupons.condition: Valid on all categories except electronics.

description: Foodpanda is one of the top food delivery services in Bangladesh, bringing delicious meals from the best local restaurants right to your doorstep.

coupons.description: Flat 30% off on selected restaurants.

Up to 50% off on food festival offers.
